Text:

Even if you're not buying plants, do a few plant related searches.

Text:
I've always been uncomfortable reaching out to people. 

Why should I bother them? Why would they want to help me? What can I offer? 

In the past 6 months, I have gone out of my comfort zone 1,000x over and reached out to multiple people I admire. 

I have never regretted it.

Text:
• Content refreshing > content creation
• Content distribution > content creation 
• Content repurposing > content creation

Text:
Great content CANNOT attract the readers it deserves if it isn’t easy to read. 

Here’s what to do:
Embedded_text:
Great content CANNOT attract the readers it deserves if it isn’t easy to read. 

Here’s what to do: 

 Write short sentences and paragraphs (aim for 3-4 sentences)
 Break content into subheadings and use bullet points (3-4 at a time)
 Use simple language—no abbreviations
